 RJ, I do not need to post things all over the net, I only took the time=
 to locate some old files from last year just for you, not for glory dear h=
eart.=C2=A0 And if you took the time to listen you would see in the message=
s that the girl had not yet been found, she as she was only missing one day=
, I got this all on the first day from spirit, and I asked spirit if I shou=
ld call it in, which i did, the police did not know it was from Spirit, he =
thought it was just people talking in a bar or something, I did not tell hi=
m what it was, but he took down the information, I am not claiming to have =
been the clue for the people at all, but they did find her body right in th=
e wall and the guy that killed her was indeed the same name given by the sp=
irit, there are people on the these lists that do remember this, but I thin=
k it was Bruce's list, he could verify it please don't keep bothering me wi=
th such mundane talk, i am not going to respond anymore to you, this is sil=
ly, if I cannot convince you, then I leave it in the hands of the Great Alm=
ighty, Peace lets be still, sf



-----Original Message-----
From: Rj <r=
asterer@...>
To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Sat, Jul 10, 2010 9=
:59 am
Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: Last nights files,

          =C2=A0     =
                             If you want to post a prediction, post one.=C2=
=A0 Give specific dates and details.=C2=A0 Try not to make it for something=
 that is already all over the news and whose outcome is already pretty obvi=
ous.

You keep saying you don't need to prove this stuff, then you keep try=
ing to post proof.=C2=A0 Just giving more stories from the past does not pr=
ove anything.=C2=A0 No one can confirm the story: and I'll bet, even though=
 you claim to have gone to the police with it, you will not be able to even=
 produce the police report.=C2=A0 And I'll bet there was not one mention in=
 a newspaper that the case was solved by EVPs.=C2=A0 Must be a conspiracy :=
)

We can also not confirm that the stuff you are telling the police wasn't=
 already all over the news: which is how I've noticed many EVP interpretati=
ons seems operate: you hear what is already on your  mind.

So if you have =
a prediction,=C2=A0 post it far and wide, if you think it could help people=
 or save their lives.=C2=A0 What does it say about you, if could have helpe=
d people, and turned your back?

It's this kind of thing that turns believe=
rs, and even open-minded people, into skeptics.

en in the files themselves  some spirits are telling me she is dead, her vo=
ice came through, I have tons of  them, these are a few, and yes I left wha=
t they say on them, some are clearer  then others, and if the police office=
r was able to hear them,=C2=A0you should be  able to as well. I don't know =

=A0sf=C2=A0

 that doesn't make it from spirits.

ctions, but no predictions.

Nicely          done.

           Well, for me, I am satisfied, they do not nee=
d to            prove anything more to me, I have already received all the =
convincing            I need, I spoke to my mother many times in spirit, he=
aring her voice,            not to mention many other people I know persona=
lly, I feel bad for            folks who are so materialistic that they can=
not see any further than            the old brick wall surrounding them, ev=
en if one should knock it down            these type of people then questio=
n if they ever saw the wall to begin            with, their mind's are so c=
losed, the hearts so hardened. My motto is            something more like t=
his statement, it's only with the heart that one            can see clearly=
, what's essential is invisible to the eye, no matter            what a per=
son might demonstrate to such a skeptic would not convince            them,=
 so it's best you live in your world, and I will stay in            mine.=
=C2=A0 And to each is own, sf ps. i like to use the colors            becau=
se that's what they are there for. :)

ore                  interested that this is not just random radio. But, wh=
en it                  doesn't happen, it makes me wonder why people still =
claim it's                  spirits, but they must be lying. :-)

ng me with such mundane talk, i am not going to respond anymore to you, thi=

reat Almighty, Peace lets be still, sf<br>

ould knock it down            these type of people then question if they ev=
er saw the wall to begin            with, their mind's are so closed, the h=
earts so hardened. My motto is            something more like this statemen=
t, it's only with the heart that one            can see clearly, what's ess=
ential is invisible to the eye, no matter            what a person might de=
monstrate to such a skeptic would not convince            them, so it's bes=
t you live in your world, and I will stay in            mine.  And to =
each is own, sf ps. i like to use the colors            because that's what=
 they are there for. :)<br>
</b></i></font></div>

<div>           <table border=3D"0" cell=
padding=3D"0" cellspacing=3D"0">             <tbody>             <tr>      =
         <td valign=3D"top">Stories about things in the past are not testab=
le                  predictions, and continue to suggest this is all just r=
adio                  snippets that people claim are spirits, but have noth=
ing to                  justify that claim.  <br>
<br>
Like I said, po=
st a prediction                  for everyone to hear, before it happens, w=
ith specific dates and                  details.  If it happens, I wou=
ld expect to be more                  interested that this is not just rand=
om radio. But, when it                  doesn't happen, it makes me wonder =
why people still claim it's                  spirits, but they must be lyin=
g. :-)<br>
<br>
<br>
<br>

<div><font color=3D"#8000ff">RJ, unless you lived here of course     =
               you would not have proof of things, as you were not here whe=
n                    the event happened, so what's the deal?  You migh=
t get                    hit on the top of your head with a brick one day, =
and tell us                    what happened, why would any one else have c=
ause to believe                    you?  What type of prediction you w=
ould like to                    have?  Maybe some spirit out there&nbs=
p;could give you                    one, forget the lotto, it's rigged, las=
t year I got names,                    happenings for that murdered girl be=
fore they ever found her                    body, and yes, I played it for =
the police, and also posted the                    files on the lists, poli=
ce did find her body right where                    spirit said it was=
, "in the wall" even gave first and last                    name of the sam=
e guy that did it, as well as the job he                    did too.&n=
bsp; This work is subjective to the person, we                    all have =
different acuity I have nothing to prove to you, I do                    no=
t need to prove what i get to anyone.  I feel these                   =
 lists are for learning, and discovery. sf</font></div>

essage dated 7/9/2010 2:19:05 P.M. Eastern Daylight                    Time=

<div>I don't see =

believe. It means nothing else.<br>

Before it is supposed to happen, with a               =

       happen, of course.<br>
<br>
We've already got lots of               =
       end-of-the-world stuff from Frank on 2012. So we can skip           =
           those. We can measure that validity of that in                  =
    2012.<br>
